queryParams.name: zoom
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: 1 means highest available level, e.g. continent. From 2 to 5 it will be more granular as is available

queryParams.name: subject
queryParams.validValues: As provided by subject list API
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Provides a filter if we need to filter the distribution for a particular subject across geo locations
queryParams.specialNote: This parameter is mutually exclusive with geo location

queryParams.name: geoLocation
queryParams.validValues: As provided by one of previous API calls
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Provides a filter if we need to filter the distribution for a particular geolocation across subjects

queryParams.name: activeDuration
queryParams.defaultValue: Would be governed by backend settings
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Hard coded duration value which will be considered for active user calculation

response.comment: geoLocations block will be present if subject filter is applied. subjects block will be present when geolocation filter is applied. When no filter is applied, both blocks will be present
